data.title: Naima: Derivation of non-thermal particle distributions through MCMC spectral fitting
data.name: naima
data.description: Derivation of non-thermal particle distributions through MCMC spectral fitting

evidence: “`naima` is a Python package for computation of non-thermal radiation from relativistic particle populations.”
“Naima: a Python package for inference of particle distribution properties from nonthermal spectra” (title of cited paper, indicating it is a domain analysis tool used in research).
PyPI badge and link: “http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/naima.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/naima/” indicating distribution via the PyPI package registry.
